name: Compass_wordTest
description: Unit tests for the Compass class, specifically focusing on the word method with different compass points.

test_cases.name: testWordWithNullCompassPoint
test_cases.description: Tests the word method of the Compass class when the compass point is null.

test_cases.name: testWordWithNonNullCompassPoint
test_cases.description: Tests the word method of the Compass class when the compass point is non-null.
